name: Dawn Of The Zombie Out Break (Open World)
name_original: Dawn Of The Zombie Out Break (Open World)
description:
Ryan Walker A 22 Year Old scientist that is trap in Kalahari Africa He was crash off an Air Blue Jet Plane. everyone has died he was lucky to be alive. he had a couple of injuries to his leg and arm. Ryan was suppost to caring some toxic waste on the plane to Namib but that did not happen. the some mutant soldiers shoot down the plane cause alot of lifes on Kalahari. every one turn zombies Ryan this is your duty to stop those evil soilders and save the rest of the island.but that wont be easy some shot guns and ammo fell from out of the plane before you crash landed search for them and take out the evil soilders. ALERT Be Aware of Zombies in Some Area The Shot Gun will do the trick Take care Ryan AND ILL SEE YOU ON THE OTHER SIDE...

GAME REQUIMENTS.

OS: Windows 8.1 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 Bit, Windows 7 64 Bit Service Pack 1. Processor: Intel Core i3 5020u@ 2.2GHZ (4 CPUs) / AMD X8 FX-8350 @ 4GHZ (2 CPUs) Memory: 1.6GB. Video Card: NVIDIA GTX 660 1GB / AMD HD7870 2GB. Sound Card: 100% DirectX 10 compatible. HDD Space: 1GBProcessor: Intel Core 2 Quad 2.4Ghz, AMD Phenom X3 2.1Ghz. Memory: 2GB (Windows XP) 2.5GB (Windows Vista) Free Hard Drive Space: 1GB. Video Card: 512MB NVIDIA 8600 / 512MB ATI 3870. DirectX 9 compatible Surround Sound Card. Keyboard.OS:Windows 7. Processor:2 GHz Intel Dual Core Processor. Memory:4 GB RAM. Graphics:Nvidia & AMD (512MB VRAM) DirectX®:9.0c. Hard Drive:1 GB HD space. Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible.OS:Windows 7. Processor:2 GHz Intel Dual Core Processor. Memory:6 GB RAM. Graphics:Nvidia & AMD (512MB VRAM) DirectX®:9.0c. Hard Drive:31 GB HD space. Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible.
